column1: Understanding how microbes drive planetary-scale transformation may help in the reconstructing of life's history and the search for life on other worlds. https://journals-asm-org.srv-proxy1.library.tamu.edu/doi/full/10.1128/aem.00241-25

Oxygen freed from silicate melt reacts with hydrogen to produce water up to a few tons of weight per cent, which could generate a spectrum of water contents in hydrogen-rich planets. https://www-nature-com.srv-proxy1.library.tamu.edu/articles/s41586-025-09630-7

Layered granular beds were found to promote the formation of planetary-scale complex crater features at the laboratory scale. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=597c8d46-9659-4f85-a1e9-7e6a9988864e%40redis
Planetary protection concerns both preventing biological contamination from Earth to other worlds and from other worlds to Earth. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40897531/

Due to advancements in microbiology, omics technology for studying biological molecules on a large scale has allowed scientists to appreciate how microbes drive Earth-scale processes. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=777fac4a-c0da-49b5-8d9e-2bb04053eaab%40redis

In order to maintain biodiversity and Nature's Contributions to People (NCP), it is encouraged to use integrated planning to protect a third of the Earth from economic development. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=6c24a897-f05b-4877-b63e-83d9a98f7585%40redis

Climate change has been found to be an environmental and mental-health issue, encouraging integrating climate change advocacy into mental-health treatment. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=4465423a-b999-4efa-95f6-860e3003e7e7%40redis

Alchemy's theoretical foundation has been found to be deeply tied in astrology, viewing planets as celestial influencers and codes for substances or operations. https://journals.uio.no/JAIS/article/view/9570

It has been found that the absolute magnitude of DA-type white dwarf stars can be accurately estimated from their colors which could be useful in population studies. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=af422812-06be-4e74-a5eb-084a032fee73%40redis

The star called S0-6 has been theorized to form near the Milky Way's central black hole due to orbiting close to it; however, it has been found to have more likely originated in a dwarf galaxy and migrated. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=f8f737b6-6edc-4032-947d-e2a7143a56df%40redis
